car.sidebarDescription: If you were denied a loan for a car, your credit might be a reason. Traditional lenders probably won't approve you if:
sidebarBullets: Your credit score may be too low
You may not have enough income to afford the car.

apartment.text: I wanted to rent an apartment
apartment.sidebarDescription: If your apartment application was denied, your credit might be a reason. Traditional landlords probably won't approve you if:
sidebarBullets: Your credit score is too low
You have an inconsistent payment history
You already have too much debt

business.text: I wanted to start my own business
business.sidebarDescription: If you were denied a loan to start your own business, your credit might be a reason. Traditional lenders probably won't approve you if:
sidebarBullets: Your credit score is too low
You don't have sufficient cash flow
You already have too much debt

school.text: I wanted to go to school
school.sidebarDescription: If you were denied a student loan, your credit might be the reason. Traditional lenders probably won't approve you if:
sidebarBullets: You don't have sufficient credit history
You credit score is too low

house.text: I wanted to buy a house
house.sidebarDescription: If you were denied a mortgage, your credit might be the reason. Traditional lenders probably won't approve you if:
sidebarBullets: Your credit score is too low

job.text: I wanted to get a job
job.sidebarDescription: If you were denied a job because of your credit, it's likely because your credit history is unfavorable:
sidebarBullets: You may have high amounts of debt
You may have on record a past bankruptcy or foreclosure

bank-account.text: I wanted to open a bank account

credit-card.text: I wanted to get a credit card

personal-loan.text: I wanted to get a personal loan
personal-loan.sidebarDescription: If you were denied for a personal loan, your credit might be the reason. Traditional lenders probably wonâ€™t approve you if:
sidebarBullets: You don't have sufficient credit history

car-insurance.text: I wanted to buy car insurance

utilities.text: I wanted to sign up for utilities
